name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Ticketmetric - Event Data and Analytics Extension

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: The most advanced tool offering data and analytics for Primary and Secondary Ticket Marketplaces.
short.de: Zeigt die Anzahl der verbleibenden Tickets an

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension for  Ticketmetric members.

The extension is an advanced tool offering data and analytics for Primary and Secondary Ticket Marketplaces.
